messages.subject: Turkish?
messages.msgSnippet: Did someone here say they have a Turkish family member (husband was it?) or was that on one of the other Unschooling spawned lists? I  have a friend who would
messages.messageBody:
Did someone here say they have a Turkish family member (husband was it?) or
was that on one of the other Unschooling spawned lists?

I have a friend who would like to get a song or two translated and she has
been able to find the Turkish lyrics, but no English.

Can anyone help? She described the song and it sounded really neat, I'd
love to see her get the lyrics.

Kelly
